00023 #pragma once
00024 #endif
00025 #include <FdoStd.h>
00026 
00027 #include <fdo/Schema/SchemaElement.h>
00028 #include <fdo/Commands/Locking/LockType.h>
00029 
00030 class FdoClassDefinition;
00031 
00032 /// \brief
00033 /// The FdoClassCapabilites class describes various capabilities
00034 /// for a particular FDO Class Definition and an FDO Provider datastore.
00035 class FdoClassCapabilities : 
00036     public GisIDisposable
00037 {
00038 protected:
00039 /// \cond DOXYGEN-IGNORE
00040     FdoClassCapabilities();
00041 
00042     FdoClassCapabilities(FdoClassDefinition& parent);
00043 
00044     virtual ~FdoClassCapabilities();
00045 
00046     virtual void Dispose();
00047 /// \endcond
00048 
00049 public:
00050     /// \brief
00051     /// Gets the locking support capability.
00052     /// 
00053     /// \return
00054     /// Returns true if objects of this class can be locked
00055     /// 
00056     FDO_API GisBoolean SupportsLocking();
00057 
00058     /// \brief
00059     /// Gets an array of the FdoLockType values supported by the feature provider.
00060     /// 
00061     /// \param size 
00062     /// Output the number of lock types
00063     /// 
00064     /// \return
00065     /// Returns the list of lock types
00066     /// 
00067     FDO_API FdoLockType* GetLockTypes(GisInt32& size);
00068 
00069     /// \brief
00070     /// Gets the long transaction support capability.
00071     /// 
00072     /// \return
00073     /// Returns true if long transactions can be created on objects
00074     /// of this class
00075     /// 
00076     FDO_API GisBoolean SupportsLongTransactions();
00077 
00078     /// \brief
00079     /// Gets the parent of this Class Capabilites object.
00080     /// 
00081     /// \return
00082     /// Returns FdoClassDefinition
00083     /// 
00084     FDO_API FdoClassDefinition* GetParent();
00085 
00086     /// \brief
00087     /// Constructs an FdoClassCapabilities instance. This function
00088     /// should only be called from an FDO Provider.
00089     /// 
00090     /// \param parent 
00091     /// Input The Fdo Class Definition that owns these
00092     /// capabilities.
00093     /// 
00094     /// \return
00095     /// Returns FdoClassCapabilities
00096     /// 
00097     FDO_API static FdoClassCapabilities* Create(FdoClassDefinition& parent);
00098 
00099     /// \brief
00100     /// Sets the locking support capability.
00101     /// 
00102     /// \param value 
00103     /// Input The locking support capability
00104     /// 
00105     FDO_API void SetSupportsLocking( GisBoolean value);
00106 
00107     /// \brief
00108     /// Sets the locking types support capability. This function should only 
00109     /// be called from an FDO Provider.
00110     /// 
00111     /// \param types 
00112     /// The supported array of lock types
00113     /// \param size 
00114     /// The number of lock types
00115     /// 
00116     FDO_API void SetLockTypes(const FdoLockType* types, GisInt32 size);
00117 
00118     /// \brief
00119     /// Sets the long transaction support capability.
00120     /// 
00121     /// \param value 
00122     /// Input The long transaction capability
00123     /// 
00124     FDO_API void SetSupportsLongTransactions( GisBoolean value );
00125 
00126 private:
00127     GisBoolean          m_supportsLocking;
00128     GisBoolean          m_supportsLongTransactions;
00129     FdoClassDefinition* m_parent;
00130     FdoLockType*        m_lockTypes;
00131     GisInt32            m_lockTypeCount;
00132 };
00133 
00134 /// \brief
00135 /// FdoClassCapabilitiesP is a GisPtr on FdoClassCapabilities, provided for convenience.
00136 typedef GisPtr<FdoClassCapabilities> FdoClassCapabilitiesP;
